jobs.title: UI/UX Designer & Prototyper
jobs.description:
This position involves creating and evolving UI/UX on both mobile and web apps. The typical candidate should be equally visual and verbal. We are looking for a perfectionist who doesn’t want to compromise and who is obsessed with details. This mentality should reflect the candidate’s lifestyle where he/she strongly cares about the products they use in life and wish to make them a little better.

Experience 
- A portfolio of product designs that have shipped on both web apps and iOS apps
- Ability to think at a high level about product strategy and able to execute on visual details
- Enough engineering fluency to talk sensibly with engineers about the feasibility of your designs
- Excellent communication skills — you should be able to clearly articulate your design decisions. You give and take critique gladly, and love working within a small design team.
- Preferably a degree in Cognitive Science, Human Factors, Human-Computer Interaction, Symbolic Systems, Product Design, or similar

Responsibilities 
- Participate in product design and discussions that take concepts to production
- Work directly with iOS and back-end engineers to deliver product specs and assets
- Contribute to high-level strategic decisions with the rest of the product, engineering, and executive teams
- Partner with engineers and other designers to keep the user experience simple and intuitive

startup.name: Diobox
startup.product_desc: Diobox is a platform for hosting and managing events from start to finish, which simplifies the previously convoluted process of incorporating contacts, guest lists, invitations, RSVPs and the check-in process into a single holistic product with a beautiful and functional user interface.

jobs.title: Front-End Web Engineer
jobs.description:
This position is for an engineer who loves building web apps. It is not simply about building features, rather building the way those features are implemented. We care much about user experience which means you have to be able to create pixel-perfect apps with a lot of attention to detail – even if it means teaching yourself something new.

Responsibilities 
- Developing frontend apps using javascript, JQuery, AngularJS, and similar javascript frameworks
- Maintaining and refining the client-facing HTML, Javascript and CSS portions of the platform
- Writing front-end automated tests to help with the QC process
- Ability to think-through and develop positive user experiences
- Ability to turn mockups and PSD files into interactive web modules
- Working closely with the product team to extend and improve the functionality of the Diobox platform
- Write semantic, modular, efficient code for creating lightweight/responsive apps
- Collaborate with the rest of the world-class Web team to keep our code base clean and stable

startup.name: Diobox
startup.product_desc: Diobox is a platform for hosting and managing events from start to finish, which simplifies the previously convoluted process of incorporating contacts, guest lists, invitations, RSVPs and the check-in process into a single holistic product with a beautiful and functional user interface.

jobs.title: Blogger
jobs.description: We are currently looking for part time writers who can contribute articles to the blog on a regular basis. This is a Freelance opportunity, so you can work from anywhere and can decide your own schedule. Go Write On!

startup.name: Old Cheese
startup.product_desc: Event Management; CSR Activities; Corporate Journey, Filmed Content Production; Public Relations; Market Research; Brand Management; Direct Marketing & Experiential Media.

jobs.title: Marketing & Promotions Freelancer
jobs.description: The job of a Marketing & Vendor Promotions Intern is to get people to the event. Be it a party at a A-Level nightclub in Delhi or a play at some auditorium. You need to understand the product/ service well and sell it to the general public. Having no skill required on this as such, we would recommend you to apply only if you're patient and have a good social network. The job is flexible. You're not working in an office and can work from anywhere at any given time of your convenience.

startup.name: Old Cheese
startup.product_desc: Event Management; CSR Activities; Corporate Journey, Filmed Content Production; Public Relations; Market Research; Brand Management; Direct Marketing & Experiential Media.

jobs.title: Graphic Designer
jobs.description:
We cannot function without a graphic designing intern. They simply create magic with their hands. You'll be designing for our clients, for us and literally everything that Old Cheese can ever think of doing. You should have aced advanced level commands of MS Office, Adobe Creative Suite (predominantly Illustrator/ Photoshop/ Dreamweaver/ InDesign).The intern will focus on creative direction- from brainstorming ideas to developing visual communication elements that include:

•Graphical execution of e-mail campaigns, newsletters, banner ads, posters, social media promotions, blog posts/news releases, flexes, print/digital brochures.
•Continuous refinement of site/page templates, wire frames, navigation, storyboards and interactive elements.
•Ensure work meets its deadlines; keep Coordinator and/or customer updated on status of job.

startup.name: Old Cheese
startup.product_desc: Event Management; CSR Activities; Corporate Journey, Filmed Content Production; Public Relations; Market Research; Brand Management; Direct Marketing & Experiential Media.

jobs.title: Social Media Intern
jobs.description:
A Social Media Intern at Old Cheese is one of the reasons people would love us. They help us be up there in the mosh with our competitors and ace it. You must have excellent analytic, strategic and communication skills. It'll be a great plus if you can write well. You should be able to work in fast paced environment on multiple tasks simultaneously and also as part of team but still be able to function independently. Here is the job description:

•Managing and optimizing social media platforms, the website and any other relevant digital assets as well as respond and react to changes within social networks.

•Understanding brand requirements and building their digital identity.
•Be aware and updated on social, digital and marketing trends with a foresight to continuously adapt these to ongoing strategies

startup.name: Old Cheese
startup.product_desc: Event Management; CSR Activities; Corporate Journey, Filmed Content Production; Public Relations; Market Research; Brand Management; Direct Marketing & Experiential Media.

jobs.title: Sales & BD Executive
jobs.description:
A Sales & Business Development Executive is the most important person at Old Cheese. They help us create new businesses and generate new revenue streams. You need to be well equipped with skills in networking, time management and making presentations. You should be able to work in fast paced environment on multiple tasks simultaneously and also as part of team but still be able to function independently. This the summary of the profiles you will work on:

•Prospect new potential businesses via various strategic initiatives such as cross-departmental collaboration with respect to marcom activities.
•Availability for regular travel to client site.
•Achievement of new-sales, including expansion sales (up-sell), revenue growth targets of portfolio in territory.
•Negotiate and close contracts for new sales.

startup.name: Old Cheese
startup.product_desc: Event Management; CSR Activities; Corporate Journey, Filmed Content Production; Public Relations; Market Research; Brand Management; Direct Marketing & Experiential Media.

jobs.title: Business Research Intern
jobs.description:
A Business Research Intern is a critical member at Old Cheese and plays a vital role in strengthening the roots of our business. You need to be well equipped with skills in making presentations and working with heavy data in excel. You should be able to work in fast paced environment on multiple tasks simultaneously and also as part of team but still be able to function independently. This the summary of the profiles you will work on:

•Market intelligence, do SWOT analysis of competition.
•Conduct primary research with end users and technology vendors.
•Conduct secondary research for published reports using industry sources, including competitive assessment and third-party data analysis.
•Track market trends, identify threats and opportunities and recommend and implement strategies and plans to address them.
•Share new updates in market to colleagues and supervisors.
•Knowing the customer with regularly updated research models and case studies.

startup.name: Old Cheese
startup.product_desc: Event Management; CSR Activities; Corporate Journey, Filmed Content Production; Public Relations; Market Research; Brand Management; Direct Marketing & Experiential Media.

startup.name: Instamojo
startup.product_desc:
We help individuals & small businesses collect payments instantly with a link through SMS, email, social channels or through simply embedding on websites or blogs. 

Here's 3 basic reasons why people choose us over others:

+ No technical integration required. 
+ Zero hassles. 30-seconds onboarding process to get started without any extra cost.
+ Inbuilt e-commerce tools married with beautiful UI/UX to give you industry's best sales conversion.

So, we give you power-packed features to help you sell & collect payments for almost anything in a jiffy.

jobs.title: Chief Marketing Officer
jobs.description:
goCatch is Australia's leading smartphone app based taxi booking and payments platform. With $4.5M in funding secured to date including some of Australia's top VC firms, over 38,000 completed journeys a month, and over 5,500 unique engaged drivers a quarter, goCatch is in prime position to dominate the Australian taxi market.

Join a team of fellow A players to build Australia's next big startup success story. 

As Chief Marketing Officer you'll have overarching responsibilities for steering and executing goCatch's marketing strategy. You will oversee an annual marketing budget in excess of AUD$1M a year and will be part of building a brand which will become synonymous in Australia for taxis you can count on.

You'll be based in Sydney, Australia, consistently ranked as one of the top 10 most liveable cities in the world. With beautiful beaches, a spectacular harbour, and plenty of clear blue sky days.

This role is for someone who has a proven track record at the most senior levels for effectively executing a successful marketing strategy. You'll have worked in a consumer facing online/mobile business and have taken a company through the growth phase through to an exit.

Sound like the right role for you? Please send through your CV and cover letter and we'll get in touch!

startup.name: goCatch
startup.high_concept: Australia's leading smartphone based taxi bookings & payments platform

jobs.title: Inside Sales Rep
jobs.description:
ActivityHero.com is the #1 website for parents to find classes, activities and camps for their kids. Parents can register with one simple form.  

We are VC funded and growing quickly.  We have a proven sales model and are expanding our team of sales professionals.  Our sales reps contact businesses that offer classes and camps. ActivityHero's online registration and marketing services help these businesses reach more students, get paid, and save administrative time.

You will be responding to inbound leads and reaching out to kids' programs in San Francisco Bay Area and other major markets. We provide a previously unmet and valued service to our businesses which translates to a short sales cycle.

Job Requirements:
• Experience in inside sales
• Strong presentation skills describing or demonstrating product in an in-person or online meeting (we’ll train you)
• Highly-energetic, self-motivated, personable
• Genuinely interested in your customers and their success
• Organized and willing to maintain detailed contact records
• Basic understanding about enrollment process for kids classes and camps
• Available to work full-time (or min 30 hours per week) in our Mountain View Office

Join our team of heroes and help parents and small business owners inspire and teach more kids.  

Please apply here:  http://bit.ly/U69Nph

startup.name: ActivityHero
startup.product_desc:
Parents spend $30 Bn/yr on organized kids activities like after-school classes & summer camps. They also spend countless hours finding, planning, & coordinating these activities. 

Camp & class organizers are busy running their kids' programs. They have outdated websites, few new students and no time to spare. 

ActivityHero is a one-stop shop for parents to search, plan & book kids’ activities. ActivityHero also provides all-in-one 
marketing, registration and CRM platform to activity providers.
startup.high_concept: One-stop shop to find and book activities

jobs.title: Sales Manager
jobs.description:
Cultivate relationships with new potential value-added resellers.
Maintain relationships with existing value-added resellers.

startup.name: Well Done
startup.product_desc: Well Done provides a cash register/point-of-sale(POS) software program for independently-owned restaurants. Our software runs on any Windows 8 device, is primarily cloud-based, and is sold and supported through a network of value-added resellers.

jobs.title: Support Engineer
jobs.description: This person will support our network of value-added resellers, as well as perform QA testing on new builds and develop documentation.

startup.name: Well Done
startup.product_desc: Well Done provides a cash register/point-of-sale(POS) software program for independently-owned restaurants. Our software runs on any Windows 8 device, is primarily cloud-based, and is sold and supported through a network of value-added resellers.

jobs.title: Lead Software Engineer
jobs.description:
Do more than code. Defy is looking for innovators and problem solvers who want to have an enormous impact on society and engineer beautiful applications that help solve America's largest and most ignored social problem.
 
Defy is a social learning platform that helps formerly incarcerated men and women transform their lives and the lives of others.
 
At Defy, you will tackle world-changing challenges that have never been solved before, such as:
**Designing a machine learning model that assesses student performance and optimizes their learning path
**Building innovative ways for formerly incarcerated individuals to learn online
**Reimagining ways for students and business executives to collaborate and connect online
**Building technology that formerly incarcerated men and women can interact with like butter

Skills
Ruby-on-Rails, python or other dynamic programming language
MySQL, MongoDB,AWS, Redis
Github or similar software repository
Proficient working in a Linux environment

You should have depth and experience with some overlap of the above. We like generalists, but by no means require a unicorn. We prefer T-shaped expertise—with depth in one area and broad interest in developing other areas.

The most important characteristic we look for is that you’re able to figure out what should be done and get it done—this requires thoughtfulness with a bias towards taking action and assuming responsibility. This is absolutely crucial in a small startup team, and for this reason, we prefer that you already have demonstrated this experience working in a prior startup.


 Modeled off of startup accelerators and incubators, Defy’s intensive 6-month program provides carefully selected, ambitious men and women with criminal histories entrepreneurship, leadership and employee development to help them become successful businessman, employers, parents and community leaders

jobs.title: cofounder/technologist
jobs.description: I would love to join up with somebody who feels passionately about this market and has ideas about the product

startup.product_desc: The go-to website for the latest on Chrome apps and javascript apps

jobs.title: Inside Sales Representative
jobs.description:
Looking for a motivated, energetic sales representative to help Zype tackle the growing online video market.

Experience in media, SaaS, and cloud computing a big plus.

Office hours in convenient Manhattan location.

startup.name: Zype
startup.product_desc:
/* See Zype in action at http://yugioh.com */

Zype enables video publishers to own their audience and earn more revenue through video destinations and apps. 

Our platform includes command line tools, APIs and dashboards that speeds time to market and creates immersive video experiences. 

Zype allows content owners to leverage multiple video sources including Hulu, YouTube, traditional OVPs in addition to our own delivery network.  Smart business rules allow dynamic players to be optimized based on viewer location, device, licensing rules or revenue.  Our VideoMeta technology reduces time to market and creates search and social marketing footprints to increase reach.

Our technology has been developed by a team with deep experience in building and managing highly scalable cloud platforms.
startup.high_concept: The Next Generation Platform for Premium Video.

We're creating a world where brands and consumers live in harmony - where marketing and targeting isn't creepy and value is something that is cherished and exchanged willingly.
startup.high_concept: Think  credit card "Thank You Points" but for apps

jobs.title: Software Engineer - Full Stack
jobs.description:
You can build apps with web technologies and accomplish everything that a native mobile app can do. You have the passion to design and develop web applications that work and appeal cross platform.  You know browser as well as backend web technology and can deliver a working app in little time. You are a team player eager to expand your skillset and master new technologies as needed.

Must Have:
•	Java Script, jQuery, HTML/HTML5, CSS
•	Flask, Python, Django and/or Ruby

Preferred Skills:
•	Knowledge of building cross platform/cross browser web applications
•	Secure web client to server communication, SSL/HTTPS
•	Knowledge working with Google App Engine, AWS or Heroku
•	Bachelors Degree in Computer Science or Equivalent
•	Minimum 2 years of hands on experience (includes relevant internships)

startup.name: hiku
startup.product_desc:
hiku remembers for you, and shops for you. 

Consumers use hiku to scan or speak items into their shopping list. It's so easy a five-year old can do it. When you walk in the store, your list is always with you via the hiku mobile app. So you remember what you need.

hiku also shops for you by finding items in your list for sale online, and allowing you to purchase them right from your phone. Highly contextual commerce.

jobs.title: Marketing Specialist
jobs.description:
Looking for a bright marketing specialist to work on a cutting edge geo-targeted marketing campaign. Candidate should be a creative and articulate individual with prior marketing experience. 

Specific responsibilities
1. Drive sign-up's on entreda's website
2. Maintain marketing calendar
3. Write compelling blog posts
4. Organize webinar's
5. Email newsletters and customer outreach
...

startup.name: Entreda
startup.product_desc:
The Unify Cloud platform lets you manage users, devices, networks, apps (on-premise or cloud), data all in one place. Simple to use and access from anywhere, anytime. 

That's Big Enterprise IT made simple for small businesses in the age of Cloud and BYOD....
startup.high_concept: What Netflix does for movies, we do for IT apps for small businesses

jobs.title: Lead Software Developer
jobs.description:
As a Lead Software Developer, you will be considered a rock star at our company. You will play a pivotal role in developing our cloud based media data engine while guiding junior team members to success. Day to day activities will include architecting/writing/reviewing code, mentoring and communicating with key customers/vendors.

Minimum requirements:
• Bachelor's Degree
• Computer Science or related major
• 5+ years professional coding experience
• Experience in at least one of the following areas: HTML5 web applications, RESTful API development, workflow/queuing software, automated testing/build tools, video/audio encoding, and Automated Speech Recognition (ASR)
• Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, with a strong attention to detail
• A unique and much desired "just get things done" mentality
• Leadership oriented person who wants to be a part of a fast growing company

Bonus points for experience with:
• Release management
• Leading small teams of developers
• QA management
• Knowledge of Python or JavaScript

About The Company Hiring:
cielo24 is a technology startup located in downtown Santa Barbara. We provide searchable captions and subtitles to clients in the online education, enterprise and entertainment industries. We have an experienced team of developers and business professionals working to help make online media accessible and searchable to markets in need of a fast, accurate and low cost transcription solution.

startup.name: cielo24
startup.product_desc:
cielo24 delivers searchable captions as an on demand web service for large media partners in the online education, enterprise, and entertainment markets.

we have provided searchable meta data for 10K's of videos for market leaders like coursera, lynda.com and more than 100 organizations.

our scalable media refinery creates high quality, searchable meta data from unstructured media including indexes, transcripts, captions and subtitles.

our hybrid platform leverages automation and large public and private crowds for 99%+ accuracy.

our focus is professional internet media delivering content accessibility and ROI by extending reach, content discovery and ADA compliance.

jobs.title: Software Engineer I
jobs.description:
Ground 2 Table is a stealth-mode startup looking to expand our development team. Our mission

is to contribute positively towards sustainable living by transforming food consumption patterns.

We are searching for professional, motivated, self-learners passionate about sustainability and 

hacking on open-source technologies!

Our project pipeline presents the opportunity to work on, with, or build:

● Django-based platforms for CMS and Ecommerce.

● Web scraping systems utilizing the Scrapy framework.

● A/B Testing implementation.

● Dashboarding, including the development of Key Performance Indicator (KPI) 

identification and tracking system(s).

● Integrations with third party vendors and the design/maintenance of RESTful APIs used 

for internal and external consumption.

Responsibilities

● Work with Software Engineers to maintain and improve current infrastructure.

● Provide operations support for our stack to the customer support, finance, and 

operations teams.

● Bring new products to market using an Agile development methodology.

● Brainstorm and take ownership of process and system improvements.

Eligibility Requirements

● Bachelor’s degree in CS or related (or equivalent experience)

● Frontend HTML/CSS and JavaScript/AJAX (jQuery, Prototype) (2+ years minimum)

● SQL/MySQL, ORM (2+ years minimum)

● Experience working with the MVC design pattern in backend development (Django 

preferred) (2+ years minimum)

Additional Desired Qualifications:

● Python, Django (a plus)

● Experience working with source control (Git)

● Experience working in an Agile development team (a plus)

startup.name: Ground 2 Table, Inc
startup.product_desc: Ground 2 Table (G2T) lets you take control of your cooking experience with a revolutionary recipe and ingredient matching model. With sustainability at the core of its mission, G2T will expand its users culinary universe with education, social networking and a killer product.
startup.high_concept: A pinch of tech, a splash of organics and a dash of sustainability

startup.name: CitySide
startup.product_desc: CitySide aims to make the traditional car wash a thing of the past.  A clean car at the tap of button through our on demand services will disrupt an industry that is ripe for innovation.  We leverage our convenient services to busy work professionals(target market) in centralized locations (parking garages) because it is an amenity to the facilities we service and ultimately facilitates sales.

jobs.title: CTO co founder
jobs.description:
We are looking for an open minded and super skilled IT guy with deep knowledge and experience in JavaScript,CSS, MySql ,Python to help us fully polish our product.

If you want to be part of a new big think, just get in touch. We need a WEB development ninja more than air.

We are  in a seed level stage, ready for a fast growing and we need to perfectly prepare our beta.

startup.name: EyeLoop
startup.product_desc:
EyeLoop is an online payments security service that use a real time face recognition protocol to approve or not an online payment.
 A face recognition hyper advanced like 3D secure code from VISA or MasterCode from Master Card.
 We imagined and designed EyeLoop in an attempt to develop an avant-garde yet simple and accessible technology that can provide users around the world with a piece of mind online payment security system. EyeLoop will set the rebirth of user confidence in online transactions and will be the cornerstone of online fraud prevention. Every fragment of EyeLoop  was built in order to better serve business and the end user at the same time, simply bring trust and confidence to us all.
     This system has all necessary features to become a booming business for users around the globe.

startup.name: Bitwage
startup.product_desc:
Based out of Palo Alto, California, we are dedicated to making a secure, seamless experience for the entire Bitcoin employer-employee relationship. Companies using Bitwage can reap the advantages of using Bitcoin Payroll, such as talent acquisition, advertising, and lower international costs, while Bitwage takes on the risk.

Through Bitwage, Bitcoin users no longer need to have a bank account in order to enter the Bitcoin space.

Taxes
We pay all payroll-related taxes regardless of receiving BTC or USD

Ease of Use
Send one amount of either BTC or USD and we handle the rest
We accept any mixture of BTC or USD and distribute any mixture of BTC or USD

Security
We text employees to reconfirm that the wallet address is theirs and in their possession
We implement multi-sig wallets so we do not hold full custody of customer funds

Scalability
Aggregation software allows admins to quickly and easily obtain employee BTC percentage and wallet preferences

jobs.title: Business Development, APAC
jobs.description:
AppDirect is the leading marketplace as a service and management platform, powering the enterprise cloud marketplaces of brands like: AT&T, Staples, Comcast, Cloud Foundry, Cox, and many more around the globe. We are a five-year old, high growth technology company looking to bring on experienced, strategic, communicative, and dedicated sales professional to work as our first Business Development team member in Singapore.

This is a high growth, high-impact role revolutionizing how businesses find, buy, and use software. If you're all about closing massive deals that affect millions of users around the globe, then AppDirect is for you. Salary ranges below reflect On Target Earnings (OTE) on a 50/50 split.

startup.name: AppDirect
startup.product_desc:
AppDirect is the leading cloud marketplace and management company. Dedicated to revolutionizing the way businesses run, our award-winning platform offers an out-of-the-box solution that allows you to launch a full branded marketplace in weeks instead of years, driving down development costs and deliver instantaneous value to your customers. Whether you're an independent software vendor (ISV) that builds apps, or a channel looking to sell them, AppDirect's marketplace-as-a-service technology will put you in a rocket-ship to the cloud. 

You provide the place, we provide the market.
startup.high_concept: The Leading Cloud Service Marketplace & Management Platform

jobs.description:

This is a high growth, high-impact role revolutionizing how businesses find, buy, and use software. If you're all about closing massive deals that affect millions of users around the globe, then AppDirect is for you. Salary ranges below reflect On Target Earnings (OTE) on a 50/50 split.

jobs.title: Sr. Software Engineer - Mobile
jobs.description:
You are a top mobile app developer ready for the challenge of building a shopping app for daily use by millions of customers. You enjoy both design and implementation for performance, reliability, and a superior user experience.
You eat problems for breakfast and take pride in finding creative solutions by dinnertime. You are self-driven and work independently as well as deliver on time.
You love working with a talented and driven technical team and can communicate effectively.

Must Have:
•	Mobile Application Development using any of Java, Java Script, C# or Objective-C
•	Object Oriented Design, Object Oriented Programming, and Design Patterns
•	Working knowledge of using iOS and Android Simulators to rapidly develop and debug


Preferred Skills:
•	App release and version management
•	Knowledge in Core Data or equivalent data store management
•	Knowledge of Client-Server architectures and HTTP APIs
•	Bachelors in Computer Science or related degree, MS preferred
•	Minimum 5 years of hands on mobile development

startup.name: hiku

hiku remembers for you, and shops for you. 

Consumers use hiku to scan or speak items into their shopping list. It's so easy a five-year old can do it. When you walk in the store, your list is always with you via the hiku mobile app. So you remember what you need.

hiku also shops for you by finding items in your list for sale online, and allowing you to purchase them right from your phone. Highly contextual commerce.

startup.product_desc: Event planning SaaS. Web-based CAD diagramming. World's most powerful seating chart software. A CRM for your event.

jobs.title: Sr. Data Engineer/Architect
jobs.description:
Will be responsible for architecting and developing the data API and pipeline for our platform. 

Desirable Skills and Experience:
5+ years data engineering experience
Proficiency with big data technologies (e.g., Spark, Hadoop/MapReduce, Hive, Cassandra, Storm)
Experience with Scala or willingness to learn
Strong fundamentals in algorithms, functional programming, software design
Effective organizational skills and process/project management abilities with strong attention to detail
Experience coordinating work with third-party development and data vendors
Exceptional analytic, writing and communication skills
Adept at learning and applying new technologies
Statistics, probability, mathematics and machine learning expertise
Proficiency in R, math/stat packages (SPSS, Matlab, SAS, etc.), statistical computing with Python a plus.

tags.name: Machine Learning, Data Science, Python, Perl, R
tags.display_name: Machine Learning, Data Science, Python, Perl, R

startup.name: Algorithmia
startup.product_desc: Algorithmia gives developers the ability to turn algorithms into scalable web services with a single click. Application developers can then integrate the algorithm into their own applications with under 10 lines of code. Algorithmia hosts the web services , makes them discoverable and enables algorithm developers to get paid for usage.

startup.name: Social Tables
startup.product_desc: Event planning SaaS. Web-based CAD diagramming. World's most powerful seating chart software. A CRM for your event.

startup.name: Social Tables
startup.product_desc: Event planning SaaS. Web-based CAD diagramming. World's most powerful seating chart software. A CRM for your event.

startup.name: Quantified Skin
startup.product_desc:
Skin Health involves understanding diet, exercise, genes, activities and lifestyle. We are data driven system that analyzes a persons quirks and prompt them to get closer to better skin. 

Our smart system looks at skin care products a person uses to gauge their skin health desires and notifies them about lifestyle choice that might be getting in the way of healthy skin. We use selfies, picture based quizzes and data from wearable trackers. 

This platform also benefits businesses. Small businesses have access to a new set of users dedicated to achieving healthy lifestyles to promote healthy skin.  We allow these businesses to have targeted outreach to our users. Cosmetics companies now have a clearer understanding of select demographics for target marketing and new product development.

jobs.title: Javascript Developer
jobs.description:
You'll be working extensively with REST APIs using JS and you should be very comfortable with cross-browser development and debugging. We're looking for somebody with solid Javascript and testing skills.

No degree required. This is a 2 month contract position, paid at around $50 per hour depending on experience.

We work out of SURF Incubator, a co-working space in Downtown Seattle with dozens of other startups. There are great networking opportunities, including a wide variety of meetups and developer interest groups.

startup.name: Saltbox
startup.product_desc:
Wax LRS lets companies connect disparate sources of training data in one dashboard so they can browse all the data in one place, optimize their training and see how it impacts employee performance.

Saltbox helps companies aggregate and analyze learning data to improve employee performance.
startup.high_concept: We measure employee training and performance for large companies

jobs.title: VP Sales
jobs.description: Candidate should have min 10 years experience in med-Surg or Legal services.  You would selling advertising to the very same clientele.

startup.name: Top 10 Rankings
startup.product_desc:
The company has a robust portfolio of keyword Rich URL's targeting high earning professionals.  The model is not all in but more of a limited number of listed professionals 10 per state/market giving the client a better chance at client acquisition.   We make the sites relevant to category with original professionally written content on their profession, thus creating a organic rank with relevance to profession.  We use keywords in our urls like plastic Surgeon and the curiosity hook of "ranking" or review in it's boolean matrix longtail. Everyone sees the inflight magazines listing top Doc's @ $15,000 which is hard pressed acquire a patient if in Dallas and Dr. is in Seattle.  The same goes for the mass directories which list everyone possible thus decreasing odds of conversion.  Ours is 10 to 1 not 1000's to 1. It is all about rank and relevance.  We provide a toll free number where clients can monitor their own staffs conversion on call's generated by our sites referrals.
22 URL's!
startup.high_concept: Professional Directory focused on high end earners with limited entry

startup.name: Summer Technologies
startup.product_desc:
Summer Technologies is the first and only software startup for cattle ranchers. We’re a team of Stanford grad students building a platform for grassfed cattle ranchers to track herd grazing, and photograph pastures between grazings to measure grass production. Our mission is to upend agriculture by helping sustainable ranchers take over their industries. We are passionate about large-scale positive impact on the food system, building a company grounded in integrity and trust, and enabling everyone we touch to make better decisions. 

Our first product is an iPad app for cattle ranchers to draw paddocks on a map and geotag photos of grass between grazings. Features include:

- Ability to create paddocks by tracing with your finger on a Google Earth map
- Taking geotagged photos and making notes of grass heigh before and after grazing

We are slated to officially launch in fall of 2014. In the mean time sign up for our mailing list at www.farmtocloud.com
startup.high_concept: Intelligent farming: putting your farm into the cloud

jobs.title: User Experience Designer
jobs.description:
Dunwello is an early-stage startup (4 full-time people) looking to hire a UI/UX designer. We are looking for someone who is ambitious, generally excellent, has a good sense of humor, and has a passion for crafting simple and elegant user interfaces for consumer products. Our vision is to build something that will make people happier, which if you ask us is a pretty excellent and motivating thing to do. Your job will be to help define the vision and aesthetics of both product and brand. We are looking to hire, like right now. 


Required skills:
* Experience creating UI/UX designs for consumer products (web and mobile).
* Independent thinker who cares not only about making wireframes pretty, but also challenges decisions and proposes better UX solutions. 
* Ability to “roll with it” - we have a plan, but like all startups things change frequently, so you gotta be agile. 
* Willingness to take constructive criticism and desire to learn and improve.
* Laser-sharp focus on design details for crafting a beautiful end-to-end experience.
* Rapid exploration skills for brainstorming product directions. 
* Understanding that a product needs a certain personality, and willingness to develop alignment between product and brand. 
* Desire to help others and yourself be both happy and productive. And you should be prepared to either make us laugh, or at least laugh at our bad jokes. 

Bonus skills:
* HTML, CSS, Javascript knowledge. 
* Prototyping ability. 
* Experience running user tests.

startup.name: dunwello
startup.product_desc: Dunwello is a social recognition platform for sales and customer service teams. Dunwello makes it easy for coworkers and customers to highlight a job well done and automatically turns the moments in to highlight reels that individuals and managers can look back at so great work is never forgotten.
startup.high_concept: Social recognition platform for sales and customer service teams.

jobs.title: VP Sales - B2B SaaS Startup
jobs.description:
About the role: As Jhana’s VP of Sales, you’ll be responsible for sales and sales development, and will have a major impact on the company’s growth and direction.

About Jhana: The mission that gets us out of bed in the morning is simple but not easy: Help people be more successful at work.

To achieve this goal we’ve assembled a high-performing team of entrepreneurs, sales and customer success champions, and deep thinkers who get really excited about ideas and learning. Together, we’re creating and supporting an online resource to help new managers become good managers — a result that not only benefits them, but also their teams and organizations. With over 20 delighted customers (including Facebook, Groupon, Eventbrite, Match.com, Modcloth and SolarCity) we’re well on our way to building a long-term company. To learn more check out our team and product.

Your responsibilities

Help build a successful, long-term, mission-driven company
Continue the rapid growth and own the overall sales number, including new business, expansions and renewals
Hire, manage, coach and motivate the sales and sales development team
Relentlessly improve and scale the sales process
Member of Jhana’s executive team, reporting to the CEO

REQUIREMENTS

Proven track record of being an amazing sales leader who can build a high-producing, customer-focused sales team. Extensive experience in B2B SaaS, specifically a high-touch inside sale. Experience selling to HR helpful, but not required.
Driven, high-energy, smart, learns quickly
Strong recruiter, manager and team-builder
Process improver
Sales culture fit –– very customer-centric and very high-integrity
Overall culture and mission fit –– see Jhana's values here

BENEFITS

Great, mission-driven team that will push you to grow and be your best. Competitive compensation package and generous equity. Full medical/dental/vision benefits. Based in San Francisco.

startup.name: Jhana
startup.product_desc:
Jhana is a hosted, secure and scalable online resource with original content and tools. We provide practical guidance on a wide range of essential business topics like delegation, productivity, running meetings, coaching and more. The important stuff that’s often overlooked but critical to business success.

We’ve developed hundreds of original and practical articles, videos and tools that are available instantly through a dead-simple online platform, ensuring your managers get the help they need, when they need it. And in the process we help you identify and address hot-button issues before they spiral out of control.
startup.high_concept: Online learning for managers at tech companies.

startup.name: My Best Funnel
startup.product_desc: helps both marketers, startups and business people to optimize their value propositions and online marketing strategies to get more growth only on a website that links all the best growth hacking tools there, while exercising strategies common inbound and outbound marketing, a / b testing and more.
startup.high_concept: growth hacking  and digital marketing  multiplatform to help you startup

jobs.title: Experiences UX & Branding Designer
jobs.description:
❤ The Job
Work closely but independently with a creative director on multiple projects
On everything from brainstorming, wireframes, comps, visual design, illustration and code
Super relaxed and casual atmosphere
Grow with the studio into a creative director position.

☛ You
Be independent, a great communicator, resourceful and ready to learn fast
Have at least 1 year of full-time, studio or agency experience
Web & App Design Experience
Branding Experience
Mobile Experience is a plus
Know PS, AI, ID like no other, including all keyboard shortcuts
Understand HTML, CSS and WordPress

startup.name: Inkitt
startup.product_desc: Inkitt is a platform where authors can write novels online and readers can read them. The remarkable thing: we can predict future bestsellers beforehand by analyzing readers behavior.
startup.high_concept: Building the world’s most popular platform for writing and reading novels

jobs.title: Sales Executive
jobs.description:
Your Responsibilities:
- You will research, identify, and develop new markets and customers for Local Motion. 
- Develop new strategies for each new market identified. 
- Meet clear sales objectives for each segment outlined. 
- Remain current on market trends, activities, and competitors. 
- Work with our marketing team to ensure quality lead generation. 
- Maintain relationships with customers by providing support, information, and advice. 
- Record all sales activity in Salesforce.com. 
- Leveraging analytics to make the best decisions.

Your Skills and Experience:
- BS degree or equivalent experience. 
- 3 years minimum of proven successful track record in sales. 
- Experience in selling SaaS and/or Hardware in a B2B environment. 
- Comfortable in lead generation, presenting, negotiating, and closing sales. 
- Independent and creative team player that has self-motivated towards sales and achieving goals.

startup.name: Local Motion
startup.product_desc:
Local Motion is building car-sharing technologies for fleets.
Take a large municipality with 3000 vehicles. We start by installing our onboard module in every vehicle: it's a small RFID reader that sits behind the windshield and can lock or unlock the car doors. Employees can now book any car in the fleet and access it with their existing ID badge.
Users save time and stress.
Managers get control and can start selling a big part of their fleet: every vehicle is used and shared by more people, so fewer vehicles are needed overall.
startup.high_concept: Turning fleets into smart transportation networks

jobs.title: Installation Field Technician
jobs.description:
Your responsibilities:
- Supporting installation of Local Motion Cloud Key hardware into customer vehicles. 
- Contributing to setup and prep on all materials for retrofits. 
- Trouble shooting and problem solving quickly in a calm fashion when in the field. 
- Documenting installations into customer vehicles. 
- Traveling to customer sites when needed.

Your experience:
- Ability to read, understand and explain wiring diagrams. 
- Demonstrated organizational and documentation skills. 
- Determine subtle differences between vehicle model wiring diagrams. 
- Speedy, efficient and detailed at what you do. 
- Obsessive about maintaining a clean and organized workspace. 
- Knowledge of aftermarket automotive devices. 
- Highly motivated self-starter. 
- Eagerness to learn with a positive attitude. 
- Excellent verbal and written communication skills. 
- Can work on a team or independently. 
- Install an aftermarket stereo or alarm system in any vehicle in less than an hour. 
- CAD experience is a PLUS. 
- Automotive background is a PLUS.

startup.product_desc:
Local Motion is building car-sharing technologies for fleets.
Take a large municipality with 3000 vehicles. We start by installing our onboard module in every vehicle: it's a small RFID reader that sits behind the windshield and can lock or unlock the car doors. Employees can now book any car in the fleet and access it with their existing ID badge.

jobs.title: Software Engineer (back end)
jobs.description:
- You will be a core member of the software team of Local Motion
- We release twice a week, so you will see the impact of your code instantly
- We are small enough that every voice counts: if you want to change something in the company, we will give you the tools and help you succeed
- We believe innovation comes from mistakes so we encourage risk taking

Your experience:
- You have been part of an early-stage project where you had to build everything from the ground up or you started your own company
- You have build a service-oriented backend relying on a queuing system for asynchronous events
- User inputs scare you and you deal with those like they are a highly unstable explosive
- You SSH into a server before you take your first coffee of the day
- You have a special relationship with your text editor (we used IDEA here, but we welcome any flavor)

jobs.title: Systems Administrator
jobs.description:
Your Responsibilities:
- Designing, organizing, modifying and supporting our company’s computer systems. 
- Setting up and maintaining our Linux and Windows servers. 
- Providing a reliable platform for our development team, from the hardware to the application server layer. 
- Designing hardware and network architecture. 
- Deploying a new dedicated VLAN with QoS for the SIP phones. 
- Setting up new laptops for new team members. 
- Maintaining LAN network to ensure connectivity at all times. 
- Ensuring design of system allows all components to work properly together. 
- Analyzing and isolating issues. 
- Troubleshooting problems reported by users. 
- Evaluating and modifying system’s performance. 
- Maintaining integrity of the network, server deployment and security. 
- Making recommendations for future upgrades. 
- Maintaining network facilities on individual computers, such as drivers, settings and printer configuration. 
- Identifying user needs. 
- Administering servers, computers, printers, routers, switches, phones, software deployment, firewalls, security updates and patches.

jobs.title: iOS Developer
jobs.description:
We are looking for one great iOS developer (junior or senior) to join our incredible team here in Montclair, NJ. If you live in NYC, no problem. You can work here a couple days a week and in the city a couple days a week. We are only a 30 minute train ride from Penn Station to Montclair, NJ.

UpdateZen has just entered beta, and we are focusing on user acquisition for our beta, and responding to lots of feedback from our earliest beta users. There is a great deal of iOS development to do for our incredibly innovative solution.

You will be working with our VP Software Development who is one of the brightest, most experienced developers anywhere. 

We have an awesome team, and we need a great developer with an even greater attitude. 

If interested, email me at paul@updatezen.com

startup.name: UpdateZen
startup.product_desc:
UpdateZen is a very simple status reporting tool that provides executives short updates on everything important their people are working on. We do this by providing their direct reports and team members with a simple interface to write updates and document the status of their projects.  UpdateZen replaces the dreaded weekly status update and other ad hoc ways executives are currently updated by their people.

(via iPhone app and the web)
startup.high_concept: Simple status reports from your team
